name: New Zealand Research Information System (NZRIS) Data Specifications Health Research Council Theme
maintainer: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Description: Health and Wellbeing in New Zealand
Improving Outcomes for Acute and Chronic Conditions in New Zealand
Definition: Keeping populations healthy and independent throughout life
Improving outcomes for people with illness or injury
Improving health and disability service delivery outcomes over the short-to-medium term
Supporting Māori health research that upholds rangatiratanga and uses and advances Māori knowledge, resources and people
